languages.text: "Отрадно слышать. Раз вас связали узы союзничества, когда все закончится, я обращусь именно к вам с просьбой покарать династию Винтерскейл за неповиновение. Надеюсь, Каллигосу будет приятно увидеть в качестве своего палача знакомое лицо".

"I am delighted to hear it. Since the two of you are now bound by allegiance, when all this is over, I will call upon you to carry out House Winterscale's punishment for its disobedience. I hope Calligos will be gratified to see a familiar face in his executioner."
languages.original_text: "Отрадно слышать. Раз вас связали узы союзничества, когда все закончится, я обращусь именно к вам с просьбой покарать династию Винтерскейл за неповиновение. Надеюсь, Каллигосу будет приятно увидеть в качестве своего палача знакомое лицо".

traits.locale_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Since the two of you are now bound by allegiance, when all this is over, I will call upon you to carry out House Winterscale's punishment for its disobedience. I hope Calligos will be gratified to see a familiar face in his executioner."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Since the two of you are now bound by allegiance, when all this is over, I will call upon you to carry out House Winterscale's punishment for its disobedience. I hope Calligos will be gratified to see a familiar face in his executioner."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Since the two of you are now bound by allegiance, when all this is over, I will call upon you to carry out House Winterscale's punishment for its disobedience. I hope Calligos will be gratified to see a familiar face in his executioner."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Since the two of you are now bound by allegiance, when all this is over, I will call upon you to carry out House Winterscale's punishment for its disobedience. I hope Calligos will be gratified to see a familiar face in his executioner."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “我很高兴听到这个消息。既然你们两个已经结成了联盟，那等这一切结束之后，我会请你来作为执行人，由你来惩罚温特斯凯尔家族不服从命令的行为。我希望卡里戈斯会很开心地看到，他的行刑者是他的老熟人。”
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Since the two of you are now bound by allegiance, when all this is over, I will call upon you to carry out House Winterscale's punishment for its disobedience. I hope Calligos will be gratified to see a familiar face in his executioner."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴听到这个消息。既然你们两个已经结成了联盟，那等这一切结束之后，我会请你来作为执行人，由你来惩罚温特斯凯尔家族不服从命令的行为。我希望卡里戈斯会很开心地看到，他的行刑者是他的老熟人。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Me alegro mucho de saberlo. Puesto que ahora les une una alianza, cuando esto termine le haré llamar para castigar a la casa Winterscale por su desobediencia. Espero que Calligos se alegre de conocer personalmente a su verdug{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Since the two of you are now bound by allegiance, when all this is over, I will call upon you to carry out House Winterscale's punishment for its disobedience. I hope Calligos will be gratified to see a familiar face in his executioner."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro mucho de saberlo. Puesto que ahora les une una alianza, cuando esto termine le haré llamar para castigar a la casa Winterscale por su desobediencia. Espero que Calligos se alegre de conocer personalmente a su verdug{mf|o|a}».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「それは嬉しいことを聞いた。お前たちふたりが今は誠意で結ばれるているのだから、全てが終わった暁には、ウィンタースケール家の反抗を処罰する場にお前を召集しよう。処刑人の中に見知った顔があれば、奴も喜ぶことだろう」
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Since the two of you are now bound by allegiance, when all this is over, I will call upon you to carry out House Winterscale's punishment for its disobedience. I hope Calligos will be gratified to see a familiar face in his executioner."

traits.locale_text: 「それは嬉しいことを聞いた。お前たちふたりが今は誠意で結ばれるているのだから、全てが終わった暁には、ウィンタースケール家の反抗を処罰する場にお前を召集しよう。処刑人の中に見知った顔があれば、奴も喜ぶことだろう」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « C'est une excellente nouvelle. Puisque vous êtes désormais liés par allégeance, quand tout cela sera terminé, je vous demanderai de mettre à exécution la sanction de la maison Winterscale pour sa désobéissance. J'espère que Calligos sera content de reconnaître le visage de son bourreau. »
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Since the two of you are now bound by allegiance, when all this is over, I will call upon you to carry out House Winterscale's punishment for its disobedience. I hope Calligos will be gratified to see a familiar face in his executioner."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une excellente nouvelle. Puisque vous êtes désormais liés par allégeance, quand tout cela sera terminé, je vous demanderai de mettre à exécution la sanction de la maison Winterscale pour sa désobéissance. J'espère que Calligos sera content de reconnaître le visage de son bourreau. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Freut mich sehr, das zu hören. Da Ihr beide nun verbündet seid, werde ich Euch, wenn das alles vorbei ist, dazu verpflichten, das Haus Winterzunder für seinen Ungehorsam zu bestrafen. Hoffentlich freut Calligos sich darüber, dass sein Henker ein vertrautes Gesicht ist."
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Since the two of you are now bound by allegiance, when all this is over, I will call upon you to carry out House Winterscale's punishment for its disobedience. I hope Calligos will be gratified to see a familiar face in his executioner."

traits.locale_text: "Freut mich sehr, das zu hören. Da Ihr beide nun verbündet seid, werde ich Euch, wenn das alles vorbei ist, dazu verpflichten, das Haus Winterzunder für seinen Ungehorsam zu bestrafen. Hoffentlich freut Calligos sich darüber, dass sein Henker ein vertrautes Gesicht ist."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Ne güzel. Artık ittifak bağınız olduğuna göre bu günler geride kaldığında Winterscale Hanesi'nin itaatsizliğini senin cezalandırmanı isteyeceğim. Umarım Calligos, celladının yüzüne baktığında tanıdık birini görmekten mutlu olur."
languages.original_text: "I am delighted to hear it. Since the two of you are now bound by allegiance, when all this is over, I will call upon you to carry out House Winterscale's punishment for its disobedience. I hope Calligos will be gratified to see a familiar face in his executioner."
